#summary Getting Started page.

==Dependencies==

PoHessian depends on the modules Foundation and Net from [http://pocoproject.org Poco].

Using Debian, for example, you can get it using:
{{{
$ sudo apt-get install libpoco-dev libpocofoundation9 libpocofoundation9-dbg libpoconet9 libpoconet9-dbg
}}}

If you need to build it from source, here is its [http://pocoproject.org/download/index.html download] page. Read the [http://poco.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/poco/poco/branches/poco-1.4.3/README Poco README].

==Get the code==

For now I recommend using the bleeding edge trunk PoHessian.

You can get the PoHessian code using the [http://code.google.com/p/pohessian/source/checkout instructions here].
